channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: The traffic lights here are all out, 27th January
item.description:
The traffic lights and pedestrian crossing lights have not been working for several days.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): West End Lane, West Hampstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large Wooden Pallets Fly tipped, 27th January
item.description:
There has been fly tipping of wooden pallets on the pavement next to the Superdrug side entrance used for deliveries on Merrow Street since yesterday. The pallets are obstructing the pavement and pedestrian access. Large fly tipped items are typically not moved far from where they originate. Given the recurring issues in this area, it may be worth considering Merrow Street as a fly tipping hotspot so it can be monitored more closely.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Merrow Street, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Widespread flood corner Southfield Road junction with Northfield Road EN3, 27th January
item.description:
Road is flooded. Must be a blocked gully. This happens everytime there is significant rain. Difficult to cross Southfield Road as water is widespread.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 113, Northfield Road, Ponders End, Greater London

item.title: 2 very large pot holes just past the junction of Upperton Road and Chislehurst Road., 27th January
item.description:
2 very large pot holes just past the junction of Upperton Road and Chislehurst Road. Most vehicles try to avoid them by veering left or right making it dangerous. There are more smaller ones on Chislehurst road further down the road towards the Morissons.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Chislehurst Road, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
